69:6: waam-maa  aa-dun  fauh-li-koo  biree-hin  sar-sa-rin  aa-tiyah
69:7: sak-kha-ra-haa  a-lai-him  sa-ba  layaa-linw  wa-sa-maa-niya-ta  ayyaa-min  hu-soo-man  fa-ta-ral  qaw-ma    fee-haa  sa-raa  kaan-na-hum  a-jaa-zu  nak-hlin  khaa-wiyah
69:9: wa-jaaaa   fi-raw-nu  wa-man  qab-la-hoo  wal-mu-ta-fi-kaa-tu  bil-khaa-ti-ah
69:10: faa-saw   ra-soo-la  rab-bi-him  faa-kha-za-hum  ak-hza-tar  raa-biyah
69:11: in-naa  lam-maa  ta-ghal  maaau   ha-mal-naa-kum  fil  jaa-riyah
69:12: li-na-ja-la-haa  la-kum  taz-ki-ra-tanw  wa-taiya-haa  u-zu-nunw  waaiyah
69:13: fai-zaa  nu-fi-kha  fis  soo-ri   naf-kha-tunw  waa-hi-dah
69:14: wa-hu-mi-la-til  ar-du    wal-ji-baa-lu  fa-duk-ka-taa  dak-ka-tanw  waa-hi-dah
69:17: wal-ma-la-ku  a-laaa  ar-jaaai-haa  wayah-mi-lu  ar-sha  rab-bi-ka  faw-qa-hum  yaw-mai-zin  sa-maa-niyah
69:18: yaw-mai-zin  tu-ra-doo-na  laa  tak-hfaa  min-kum  khaa-fiyah
69:19: faam-maa  man  oo-tiya  ki-taa-ba-hoo  biyamee-nihee  faya-qoo-lu  haaau-muq  raoo    ki-taa-biyah
69:24: ku-loo  was-hra-boo  haneeeam   bi-maaa  as-laf-tum  fil  ayyaa-mil  kha-liyah
69:25: waam-maa  man  oo-tiya  ki-taa-ba-hoo  bi-shi-maa-lihee  faya-qoo-lu  yaa-lai-tanee  lam  oo-ta  ki-taaa-biyah
69:32: sum-ma  fee  sil-si-la-tin  za-ru-haa  sa-boo-na  zi-raaan  fas-lu-kooh
69:33: in-na-hoo  kaa-na  laa  yu-mi-nu  bil-laa-hil  azeem
69:41: wa-maa  hu-wa  bi-qaw-li  shaair    qalee-lan  maa  tu-mi-noon
69:42: wa-laa  bi-qaw-li  kaa-hin  qalee-lan  maa  ta-zak-ka-roon
69:47: fa-maa  min-kum  min  a-ha-din  a-nhu  haa-jizeen
